amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to retire, divest, or transfer, or to prepare or plan for the retirement, divestment, or transfer of, the entire KC-10 fleet during fiscal year 2015.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Runyan amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Runyan amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Runyan.
